awd_titl_txt: Undergraduate Research Experience in Physics, Astrophysics, and Astronomy
awd_abstract_narration: This project is designed to provide ten undergraduate                      students with research experiences in physics, astrophysics and                 astronomy under the supervision of faculty members of the                       Department of Physics and Astronomy at San Francisco State                      University.  Students will be solicited from the greater San                    Francisco Bay area with an emphasis on the participation of                     women, minority and disabled students.                                               This project is supported under the Program of Research                    Experiences for Undergraduates to help ensure an adequate supply                of scientists for the future.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
